Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
doorman \doorman\ n. someone who guards the entrance to a building.
Syn: doorkeeper, door guard, hall porter, porter, gatekeeper. [WordNet 1.5]
doorman n : someone who guards an entrance [syn: {doorkeeper}, {door guard}, {hall porter}, {porter}, {gatekeeper}, {ostiary}]
